data.name: Football Coach: the Game
data.detailed_description:
Check out more games:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC


About the Game

MULTIPLAYER FOOTBALL MANAGEMENT GAME developed in direct partnership with ROBERT LEWANDOWSKI

Build up your coach personality in an RPG system. Use artifacts during the game. Become an idol of the masses. Take control over key moments of the match in STRIKER mode. Compete with players from all around the world in LOBBY mode.
Collect trophies in clan games. Take care of the private life of your manager.

Coach class selection


WHERE FOOTBALL MEETS RPG. Choose a coach class. Learn his character. Collect powerful artifacts. Use them to influence matches. Level up class-specific skill trees.

Striker mode


Have you ever been frustrated by your strikers’ inefficiency in football management games? In Football Coach you will enter the game in STRIKER mode. Take control in the key moment and finish the shot.

Stadium construction and placement


Design a home for your club in a stadium creator. Discover new types of stands. Place the stadium in an amazing location. Develop whole club infrastructure.Build one-of-a-kind facilities.

Coaching sessions


Develop your players during interactive coaching sessions. Plan your set pieces. Learn about the hidden strengths of your players. Refine your tactics.Find wonderkid in your academy.

Ranking games lobby


Play online anytime with players from all around the world. Challenge them to matches with customizable rules. Compete in tournaments and create your own ones. Join clan games or found your own clan. Become the league champion.

Card system


Collect cards that function as RPG artifacts. Some of them will add energy to your players. Others will improve their ability scores. Yet another type will help you effectively manage the match. Exchange and sell the artifacts at the in-game market.

Coach and club customization


Personalize your avatar. Personalize each aspect of your club. Create your unique shirts. Design a scarf for your fans. Identify with your team. Build your own football DNA. Make your club the icon of football.

Private life


Take care of the private life of your avatar. Nurture relationships with the players and the board. Throw money around. Build up your image, give interviews. Become a football celebrity.

Fans


Build up a fanatic support for your team. Build the community of ultras. A full stadium and a cheering crowd will unleash the additional strengths of your players, as well as unlock new artifacts. No other football management game has treated the impact of fans this seriously.

data.short_description: MULTIPLAYER FOOTBALL MANAGEMENT GAME developed in direct partnership with ROBERT LEWANDOWSKI. Build the DNA of your club. Create your dream team.Build a one-of-a-kind stadium. Be the coach you want to be. Grow prestigious. Become a legend.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Polish*, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 Ghz or AMD Phenom II 2.6 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB & nVidia 960 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

movies.name: Official trailer Football Coach: the Game
